A long time ago in a galaxy far,
far away...
The Greatest Fan of

It is a period of civil war. All individuals from the universe are claiming to be the greatest fan of Star Wars. Even intraterrestrial lives are also trying to access this game and share in the social media websites of the universe Facebook, Twitter, and so on.

During this championship, people of Earth managed to access this game. Complete the challenge, claim the title of the greatest fan of Star Wars, and share it!

May The Force Be With You!
